title: Warwick's Splash Art!
body: I personally think that Warwick needs a splash art update. This is because his current splash doesnt show me how powerful and tanky he realy is. It also hasn't been updated in awhile.{{champion:19}}

replies.body:
pretty sure almost every champion is getting a new one. Just takes time to do all 120 or so of them.

WW is supposed to be getting a full rework and VU (like Sion) so maybe they are holding off for that?
Thanks For That...I Learn Something New Everyday
